channel.title: Armour only for me!
channel.description:
heey i want rune p hat alone for me and a other guy how i can make it?
i will rep++

if yours dont work tought, i think this will work:

if(wearID == itemID && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("1stName") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("2ndName")){ return false; }

That might work.
[/quote]
worked thanx rep++ both[/quote]

And you’re welcome.

item.title: Armour only for me!
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:6, topic:370003”]Try this:

in client.java search for:

[code]public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot)[/code]

and under it add:

if(wearID == itemID && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("1stName") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("2ndName")){ return true; } else return false; } }

i believe that should work, if not just tell me.

if it fails, try this:

If this doesn’t work, simple just make 2 of the same code; that might work, but use different names for both.

But try this 1st:

[code]

  if(wearID == itemID) 
  {
  if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("insert name") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Insert name")){
  sM("Message here");
  GoFalse = true;
  }
  }

[/code][/quote]

yeah, i just looked over it agian and your right. it fails :S
if yours dont work tought, i think this will work:

if(wearID == itemID && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("1stName") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("2ndName")){ return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Armour only for me!

[quote=“jailed, post:5, topic:370003”]in client.java search for:

and under it add:

if(wearID == itemID && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("1stName") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("2ndName")){ return true; } else return false; } }

i believe that should work, if not just tell me.[/quote]
if it fails, try this:

If this doesn’t work, simple just make 2 of the same code; that might work, but use different names for both.

But try this 1st:


      if(wearID == itemID) 
      {
      if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("insert name") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Insert name")){
      sM("Message here");
      GoFalse = true;

item.title: Armour only for me!
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:1, topic:370004”][quote author=jailed link=topic=466118.msg3408879#msg3408879 date=1290529878]

heey i want rune p hat alone for me and a other guy how i can make it?

i will rep++

what base is this?
[/quote]
delta
2specced

317[/quote]

in client.java search for:

[code]public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot)[/code]

and under it add:

if(wearID == itemID && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("1stName") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("2ndName")){ return true; } else return false; } }

i believe that should work, if not just tell me.
